base_components: You may experience some issues with the dashboard.
certificates_warning: Your Cloudflare default certificate will expire Feb. 2, 2025. Update now to prevent interruptions to traffic inspection and proxy controls. <0>Manage certificates</0>
entitlements_error: There was an error fetching account permissions. Some features may be unavailable. Refresh the page to try again.
gates_error: There was an error fetching feature permissions. Some features may be unavailable. Refresh the page to try again.
product_components: Features on this page may have issues.
status_page_link: For more information, check <0>Cloudflare's status page</0>.
